DOC.brief_summary: Dextroamphetamine commonly use treat ADHD , recent evidence suggest medication may decrease drug use individual dependent cocaine . Thus , present pilot study determine ability dextroamphetamine treat individual cocaine dependence ADHD .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Examining Effect Dextroamphetamine Treat Cocaine Dependence Plus Attention-deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD )
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , placebo-controlled pilot study determine ability dextroamphetamine treat comorbid cocaine dependence ADHD . Participants randomly assign receive placebo Dextroamphetamine SR ( 60 mg/day ) 12-week study period . All participant receive weekly cognitive behavioral therapy .
